item.title: Judge says Education Dept. partisan out-of-office emails violated First Amendment
item.description: A federal judge says the Trump administration "overplayed its hand" by inserting partisan language into workers' out-of-office autoreplies.

item.title: Trump says boat crews are narco-terrorists. The truth is more nuanced, AP finds

item.title: 4 dead, 11 injured after a car chased by police plows into a crowd outside Tampa bar
item.description: A deadly crash in Tampa's Ybor City neighborhood early Saturday morning has left four people dead and 11 injured.

item.title: After 40 years, plans to deploy a new undersea habitat are in progress
